For Transfer
Upload Prospectus/Cridentials sa pag transfer para makita unsay ma credit niya nga mga subjects
Include reason for transfer
Includes all offices

Shift Form only dean

Withdrawal Slip
If withdraw and officially enrolled while classes are already starting
1.) Get withdrawal slip in the Registrar 
2.) Get signatures from all your teachers in your current subjects this sem
3.) And all offices

Kailangan pa ba himuan og form sa system para aning withdrawal slip since ang student maoy mo adto sa kada offices or Upload lang para sa documents

Evaluation:
no more old corr
concern nalang mga subject gi guha
dapat didto makita subject kwaon mga prerequisite
dapat makita lacking subject niya sa first year
Based sa prospectus
Kapag ma open ang student Ma plot diretso iyang grado

No more MoM
Attendance 
Class monitoring
Update Faculty Profile
Assigning and loading of subjects to check the room all colleges with school year
